      • build0

        public HttpToHttp2ConnectionHandler build0(Http2ConnectionDecoder decoder,
                                  Http2ConnectionEncoder encoder)
        Description copied from class: Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase
        Sub classes should override this to instantiate the concrete type.

        The return of this method will be subject to the following:

        • Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase.frameListener(Http2FrameListener) will be set if not already set in the decoder
        • Http2ConnectionHandler.BuilderBase.gracefulShutdownTimeoutMillis(long) will be set
